config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration _journalSizeThreshold is used in the code to set the size threshold for the journal. It is passed as a parameter when creating a PersistentJournal object.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration _journalSizeThreshold is triggered whenever the journal is created, which typically happens when the application starts up.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The _journalSizeThreshold configuration option impacts the size of the journal files. Setting a higher threshold may result in larger journal files, which could potentially impact the performance and storage requirements of the system.
